sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import { useState } from 'react'; import "../Styles/GenerateLetter.css"; import axios from 'axios' function GenerateLetter() { //Show Start of page after navigation useEffect(() => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); }, []); //All Form Fields const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', recipientName: '', recipientEmail: '', relationship: '', letterPurpose: '', situationDescription: '', relationshipDuration: '', characterTraits: '', achievements: '', personalGrowth: '', contribution: '', desiredJob: '', skills: '', accomplishments: '', education: '', personalAttributes: '', willingnessToLearn: '', employmentExplanation: '', additionalInformation: '', tone: '', omittedInformation: '', }); //Assigning value after every change in form const handleChange = (event) => { const { name, value } = event.target; setFormData((prevData) => ({ ...prevData, [name]: value, })); }; //Form Submit Handler const handleSubmit = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); console.log(formData); let request; if (formData.letterPurpose === 'character') { request = `Write a draft of the letter for the following information. sender name: ${formData.name}, sender email: ${formData.email}, recipient name: ${formData.recipientName}, recipient email: ${formData.recipientEmail}, sender name: ${formData.name}, sender relationship with recipient: ${formData.relationship}, purpose of letter: character reference letter, situation description: ${formData.situationDescription}, relationship nature and duration: ${formData.relationshipDuration}, character traits: ${formData.characterTraits}, achivements: ${formData.achievements}, personal growth: ${formData.personalGrowth}, contribution: ${formData.contribution}${formData.additionalInformation ? `, additional information: ${formData.additionalInformation}` : ''}, tone: ${formData.tone}${formData.omittedInformation?` and information to omit: ${formData.omittedInformation}`:''}`; } else { request = `Write a draft of the letter for the following information. sender name: ${formData.name}, sender email: ${formData.email}, recipient name: ${formData.recipientName}, recipient email: ${formData.recipientEmail}, sender name: ${formData.name}, sender relationship with recipient: ${formData.relationship}, purpose of letter: ${formData.letterPurpose}, ` } console.log(request); /* const response = await axios.post('https://api.openai.com/v1/completions', { prompt: `write a letter draft for the following information. Body: ${body}, Subject: ${subject}, recievers name: ${recipientName}, senders name: ${name}`, max_tokens: 1000, model: 'text-davinci-003' }, { headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Authorization': 'Bearer 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' } }); console.log(response.data.choices[0].text); */ }; return (

Generate a Letter

{formData.letterPurpose === 'character' ?
: formData.letterPurpose === 'employment' ?
: '' }
); } export default GenerateLetter;
